articles.author: Dmytro Hubenko, Midhat Fatimah
articles.title: Airports across Europe face disruptions due to cyberattack - dw.com
articles.description: Brussels Airport has asked airlines to cancel half of their flights departing on Sunday following a severe disruption that also affected flight hubs in Berlin, London and Dublin.
articles.content:
Operations at several major airports in Europe faced disruptions Saturday after a cyberattack targeted the service provider for check-in and boarding systems.
On Saturday evening, Brussels Airport s… [+2827 chars]
